nycTheatreExcerpt: "Floyd Collins is more meditative than propulsive, with an unhappy ending it doesn't shy from. You feel for its main character, but Collins is also a strangely meek and receding focus in his own story. Simultaneously, both his plight and the show disappear from view."

keyPhrases.quote: You feel for its main character, but Collins is also a strangely meek and receding focus in his own story.
